PHRASE.LANG: Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant yellow and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and pink flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]

Cette tenue ethnique teinte en jaune vif arbore des motifs traditionnels délicatement brodés.\nLa cape légère qu'on enroule autour des épaules et le bouquet de fleurs rose ceignant la taille mettent la touche finale à cette jolie tenue. [#Legal]

Das Trachtengewand in leuchtendem Gelb ist mit landestypischen zierlichen Mustern bestickt.\nDer leichte Schulterumhang und die rosa Blumencorsage, die um die Taille geschnürt wird, ergänzen dieses hübsche Ensemble. [#Legal]

Vestiti etnici tinti con un pigmento giallo brillante e ricamati con motivi tradizionali.\nLa mantellina coprispalle e i decori floreali rosa attorno alla vita sono i tocchi finali di questo grazioso completo. [#Legal]

El atuendo étnico está teñido en vivos tonos amarillos y delicadamente bordado con motivos tradicionales.\nLa ligera capa que cubre los hombros y el cinturón de flor rosa ponen los toques finales a este bonito diseño. [#Legal]

Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant yellow and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and pink flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]
